简单的喉咙拭子可能会提供有关老年人健康风险的线索弗林德斯大学（Flinders University）的新研究发现了一个潜在的标志物，可以为居住在长期老年护理机构中的老年人的整体健康提供宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/simple-throat-swab-may-offer-clues-clues-about-about-health-risks-in grod---------indler-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/simple-throat-swab-may-ferfer-clues-clues-about-about-health-pour----------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3c8f765-e79a-4b74-4b74-83fd-9d7d7d09e9d068 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 01:23:11 -0500 Simple throat swab may offer clues about health risks in older adults
圣裘德研究人员改善了用宠物成像和ALS药物的脑部疾病诊断正电子发射断层扫描（PET）是一种用于诊断癌症等疾病的核成像技术。圣裘德儿童研究医院科学家的创新进展正在增强该技术检查神经系统疾病迹象的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/st-jude-researchers-improve-brain-brain-disease-diarose-diarose-with-pet-imaging-imaging-imaging-mimaging-mimaging-ish-als-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/st-jude-researchers-improve-brain-brain-disease-diarose-diarose-with-pet-imaging-imaging-imaging-mimaging-mimaging-imaging-ind-al-al-al-al-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfcfcf86-0477-43ed-abb6-2a43070707af70 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 01:08:04 -0500 St. Jude researchers improve brain disease diagnosis with PET imaging and ALS drug
天然发生的分子会抑制食欲并促进体重减轻斯坦福大学医学研究人员鉴定出的一种天然存在的分子似乎与抑制食欲和减轻体重的半卢比德（也称为Ozempic）相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/naturally-occurring-molecule-suppresses-suppresses-appetite-anppetite-and-promotes-weight-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/naturally-occurring-molecule-suppresses-suppresses-appetite-and-promotes-weight-weight-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d05c132-a7b3-4014-b17d-ef11eb11eb82938a Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:33:37 -0500 Naturally occurring molecule suppresses appetite and promotes weight loss
科学家发现关键酶的结构以阻止癌细胞能量供应癌细胞对能量的食欲不足，因为它们比正常细胞更快。贪婪的癌细胞劫持了各种细胞功能，以发现和利用能量和其他资源，包括一组帮助正常细胞保持能量平衡的酶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/scientist-uncover-scrupture-of-key-enzyme-to-block-cancer-cancer-cell-energy-energy-supply.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/scientist-uncover-scrupture-of-key-enzyme-to-block-cancer-cancer-cell-energy-energy-supply.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08C648AE-56F4-4430-AA19-4D0F1267E66E Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:27:15 -0500 Scientists uncover structure of key enzyme to block cancer cell energy supply
与高级药物使用障碍风险有关的多动症治疗远程医疗近五年来，患有注意力不足/多动症障碍的人可以选择将其刺激性药物处方并被医生续签，尽管他们只有这些刺激性药物可能会滥用，但他们只会在计算机屏幕上看到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/telehealth-for-for-adhd-woreatment-linked-to-higher-substance-substance-use-disorder-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/telehealth-for-for-adhd-woreatment-linked-to-higher-substance-substance-substance-use-disorder-disorder-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7EA6C575-7124-4487-B1BD-1823C656C7C3 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:23:31 -0500 Telehealth for ADHD treatment linked to higher substance use disorder risk
突破性发现为更有效的疟疾治疗提供了希望抗疟药耐药性是打击全球疟疾传播的迫切问题。在一项新的研究中，费城儿童医院（CHOP）的研究人员发现了一个关键过程，其中疟疾寄生虫患有人类血细胞酶，这可以为抗疟疾治疗提供新的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breakthrough-discovery-frers-hope-for-for-more-more-more-malaria-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breakthrough-discovery-frers-hope-for-for-more-effective-malaria-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15304455-C776-47BB-9097-3AC0C5B63BF5 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:16:44 -0500 Breakthrough discovery offers hope for more effective malaria treatment
科学家发现了反对诺如病毒的新战略德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的科学家与北卡罗来纳大学教堂山大学和美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员合作，发现了一项战略，以反对诺如诺瓦病，这是全球胃肠炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/scientists-discover-new-new-new-strategy-to-fight-back-against-norovirus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/scientists-discover-new-new-new-strategy-to-fight-back-against-norovirus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78349d4B-25CB-4089-8D3D-E1C9EBAE7DF0 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:11:20 -0500 Scientists discover new strategy to fight back against norovirus
新抗体对可能会击败所有SARS-COV-2变体一支由斯坦福大学领导的团队发现了两种抗体，可以共同击败所有SARS-COV-2变体。需要更多的研究，但是这种方法可以帮助发展治疗，以保持发展的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/new-antibody-pair-could-defeat-defeat-all-sars-cov-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/new-antibody-pair-could-could-defeat-all-sars-cov-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8d1d1ddfb-ac30-4348-b893-72fdd800584a Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:03:00 -0500 New antibody pair could defeat all SARS-CoV-2 variants
